Accuracy.description: Correctness of the final answer with respect to the given question.

Completeness.description: The degree to which the solution addresses all parts of the question.

Reasoning Traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical steps taken by the agents to arrive at the final answer.

Efficiency.description: The amount of time and computational resources used to reach the solution.

Originality.description: The uniqueness of the solution, ensuring it was not copied from available sources.

Communication Clarity.description: The clearness and understandability of the interactions between agents, and the explanation provided.

Robustness.description: The system's ability to deal with diverse and unexpected types of questions without failure.

Scalability.description: The capability of the system to handle an increasing number of complex questions.
